description:
This Emergency programme will include the following projects:
1.	Improvement of Water Quality in Deir Al Balah 
2.	Solid Waste Management and Composting in the Beit Lahia 
3.	Implementation and strengthening of the three counselling centers in Hebron

subproject.description: Ensure the continuation and the enhancement of the services offered by the centres (socio-psychological, health and legal support to women and children victims of violence and discrimination).
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Zohra Antiviolence Centers

subproject.description: Ensure the continuation and the enhancement of the services offered by the centres (socio-psychological, health and legal support to women and children victims of violence and discrimination).
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Zohra Antiviolence Centers

subproject.description:
The project aims at reactivation and upgrading of Deir Al-Balah Sea Water Desalination Plant and providing sustainable access to safe potable water to 17,786 residents living in Al Zawaida area, located in the middle Governorate of the Gaza Strip.
Output 1:Deir Al Balah Sea Water Desalination Plant re-activated and upgraded for more effectiveness and sustainability.
Output 2: Sustainable access to safe and potable water provided in Middle Governorate of the Gaza Strip, and in Al Zawaida area in particular. 
Output 3: Increased awareness of the beneficiaries regarding efficient use of water, water quality and water resources management.
subproject.title: Upgrading Desalination Plant

subproject.corporate outcome: Expansion and access to financial services for the poor, employment and income generation and access to markets, goods and services.

subproject.description: Solid waste management and composting green and wet solid waste  in Beit Lahia .Output 1: Compost facility in Beit Lahia rehabilitated and equipped  to maintain compost production.Output 2: Increased the rate of solid waste primary collection.Output 3: Improved waste recovery though production of compost.Output 4: Improved Beit Lahia municipality staff operation and management skills to sustain production of compost
subproject.title: Solid Waste Management

title: Italian Emergency Support Programme for Gaza & WB
